description:

description:
Actor Kevin Spacey was fired from the production of the hit Netflix series House of Cards at a time when his career would be changed forever. The longtime actor faced a variety of sexual abuse allegations that seemed to have him blacklisted. Now, however, Kevin Spacey seems to be making something of a career comeback [...]

title: Kevin Spacey Makes Career Comeback In ‘Peter Five Eight’ Trailer
